news.title: Analysis: Talks could prove more vital for Ukraine's future than Trump-Putin summit
news.summary: The Washington meeting could prove to be crucial to the future of Ukraine, and all of Europe's security.

news.title: First group of Gaza children to be brought to UK 'in coming weeks'
news.summary: A group of between 30 to 50 Palestinian children will be evacuated under the plan, the BBC understands.

news.title: 'I'm such a feminist, but Bond has to be a guy,' says Dame Helen Mirren
news.summary: The Oscar-winning actor says that the famous 007 character can't be a woman as it "just doesn't work".

news.title: I saw a kaleidoscopic light before going blind, says survivor of Laos methanol poisoning
news.summary: Calum Macdonald and the families of three people who died in South East Asia call on the Foreign Office for clearer travel advice.

news.title: The Papers: 'D-Day at White House' and 'Superman star' dies aged 85
news.summary: Donald Trump's meeting with Volodymyr Zelensky and European leaders in Washington leads the UK front pages.

news.title: Bolivia set to elect first non-left wing president in two decades
news.summary: The rightward turn by the Bolivian electorate can see changes in economic policies and closer US ties.

news.title: Swatch sorry for 'slanted eyes' ad after China uproar
news.summary: The image of a model pulling the corners of his eyes resembled a racist image, critics say.

news.title: New wave of African pride rises in the Caribbean
news.summary: From jollof rice in St Lucia to Afrobeats in Jamaica, islanders find new ways to embrace Africa.
